sentences.sentence: Fix rat traps on the gangplank.
The surface of the gangplank was bossed to prevent slipping.
sentences.translation: 跳板的表面被装上凸出物以防止滑动。

sentences.sentence: She wept when he ran down the gangplank; sobbed as he stood on the dock, waving.
sentences.translation: 他急步走下跳板，她哭个不停。他站在码头上挥手，她还在呜咽。
